| a      | String(StringColumn { data: [97, 98, 99, 32, 32, 32, 97, 98, 99, 32, 32, 32, 97, 98, 99, 32, 32, 32, 97, 98, 99, 32, 32, 32], offsets: [0, 3, 9, 18, 24] }) |

+--------+-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+

checked expr   : trim_leading<String, String>("aaaaaaaa", "a")
output type    : String
output domain  : {""..}
output         : ""
